^[{-} `r blogdown::shortcode("courseinfo")`] This is the course website for SOCIOL 880: Data Visualization (Spring 2019). This is a graduate mini-seminar (i.e. a half-semester course), and the companion to the [Data Management](https://datamgmt.org) mini taught in the first half of the semester. It teaches the how and why of visualizing social science data using R and ggplot2. Learn more by reading [the syllabus](syllabus/).
